CustomField.description: When selected, the tasks that are pre-populated are based on the selected assignment. The "Limit To Tasks with Matching Assignment" field in the Select Tasks popup is then checked by default. Restrict Task Based On Assignment is deselected by default.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When selected, the tasks that are pre-populated are based on the selected assignment. The "Limit To Tasks with Matching Assignment" field in the Select Tasks popup is then checked by default. Restrict Task Based On Assignment is deselected by default.
CustomField.label: Restrict Task Based On Assignment
